title: Build Weather Dashboard Application
description:
Create a modern, responsive weather dashboard web application with the following features:

Features:
- Real-time weather display for current location
- 7-day weather forecast
- Hourly forecast for next 24 hours
- Search for weather by city name
- Display temperature, humidity, wind speed, conditions
- Weather icons matching conditions
- Celsius/Fahrenheit toggle
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Dark/light mode toggle

Tech Stack:
- Frontend: React with Next.js 14
- Styling: Tailwind CSS with modern gradients
- Weather API: OpenWeatherMap API or similar
- State Management: React hooks (useState, useEffect)
- Icons: Weather-specific icon library

Requirements:
- Clean, modern UI with smooth animations
- Error handling for API failures
- Loading states during data fetch
- Geolocation support for auto-detection
- Local storage for saved cities
- Accessible design (ARIA labels)
- Fast performance and SEO optimized

result.summary: Task failed with error: OPENAI_API_KEY not set in environment
